scripts.build: npm run proto && tsc -b && vite build
scripts.proto:
find src/generated \( -name '*.js' -o -name '*.ts' \) -delete && PATH="./node_modules/.bin:$PATH" `# for protoc-gen-ts` protoc -I ../proto ../proto/workboard.proto --ts_out=src/generated --ts_opt=json_names,no_namespace,target=web && printf '// @ts-nocheck
%s' "$(cat src/generated/workboard.ts)" > src/generated/workboard.ts
